the mechanics of this game, as an intermediate coder/dev, are absolutely phenomenal. the way the characters move, chase, the animations, the backgrounds, the layers upon layers of detail, god it's amazing. even though the game is completely different from every other fnaf game we've seen, it still has the attention to detail that is so reminiscent of every other fnaf game. still a bit buggy of course, but for a game with such a large, more open world, and so many moving parts, (which was still in the final stages when mark played, i believe), it exceeds any expectations i had.
